description: {"blocks":[{"key":"f41lj","text":"This module is part of the Ultra™ II workflow, and is optimized for use with the NEBNext®Ultra II End Repair/dA-Tailing Module (NEB #E7546), for Illumina®-compatible library construction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":88,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":153,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":133,"length":5}],"data":[]},{"key":"4vsj1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2sgj0","text":"The NEBNext Ultra II Ligation Module is optimized for use with the NEBNext Ultra II End Repair/dA-Tailing Module (NEB #E7546) or the NEBNext Ultra II FS DNA Module (NEB #E7810).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":119,"length":5},{"key":2,"offset":170,"length":5}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"C544A6E3945343E39496ACA5035F91A1","url":"https://www.neb.com/products/e7546-nebnext-ultra-ii-end-repair-da-tailing-module"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"B8840B9DEA3A4965991DBAD234E02A78","url":"https://www.neb.com/products/e7546-nebnext-ultra-ii-end-repair-da-tailing-module"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"28228BA6B5CF4151BF2C65DBFED32DFC","url":"https://www.neb.com/products/e7810-nebnext-ultra-ii-fs-dna-module"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fpnt6","text":"Set a 100 µl or 200 µl pipette to 50 µl and then pipette the entire volume up and down at least 10 times to mix thoroughly. Perform a quick spin to collect all liquid from the sides of the tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"30iag","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"88hcg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":8,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"7o6mi","text":"Caution: The NEBNext Ultra II Ligation Master Mix is very viscous. Care should be taken to ensure adequate mixing of the ligation reaction, as incomplete mixing will result in reduced ligation efficiency. The presence of a small amount of bubbles will not interfere with performance.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
